title: The rework is not why Shyvana is strong...
body:
She gained:
Unstoppable ult
HP on ult
Power to dragon form E
10% bonus damage to dragons

She lost:
Free unconditional armor and magic resist 
Damage on ult
Range on ult
Double armor and MR during ult
E piercing in both forms
E travel Speed
Fervor/SotA

She is currently strong because of a meta shift and the new jungle being OP on certain champions. Plus buffs to her core items. The rework only brought her into the spotlight. Riot needs to consider this as they tune her. And if she is nerfed will need to be rebuffed when they remove/nerf her items/the jungle. So we don't get the devourer problem again where she is nerfed for it but never rebuffed after it.

Just clarifying. It was never the rework that made her meta again. I started seeing her do better just from other changes. The rework just made her popular.

Not to metion that they take forever to touch every champion that they want to balance this way

Basically why Hec is seen as "strong" right now. Same is true for many other champs. When the conditions are right, certain champs will be successful. Some champs have broader niches. Lee has the broadest one, Shyv and Hec also have relatively large pools.

And yes, Riot said Hec was strong right now, but their justification for it can also be applied to shyv.

This is stupid. Of course the rework is why she's strong. The mythical meta shift you're talking about had absolutely nothing to do with it. They added insane amounts of power to her dragon form and lost very little as compensation. The only Shyvana item that got changed was Botrk which most Shyvana players don't even build anymore.
I guess that Lee, Hecarim, Zac and Vi are also busted because of their reworks... Oh wait. They had none. I guess it has to be due to a mythical meta shift then.

Lee and Zac were already in the meta when Shyv dropped in. Vi and Hec only showed up to pick up their free LP off of colossus being busted as hell. Her rework is a big part of why she is strong now, the jungle changes did help her but she wasn't a popular pick until last patch, which was incidentally her rework. 

Now before her rework she sat below a 50% winrate. This is with the majority of her players being dedicated mains. afterwards her playrate and winrate jumped, which implies that even newbies who are unfamiliar with her are winning. Moreover shes winning in a meta full of bully junglers and early gamers who are supposed to win the game before she even becomes relevant. She's a farm jungler excelling outside of her meta. There was no larger meta shift that caused her to be good. 

The OP does a rough job of listing both her losses and gains, as with a bulletpoint list it just looks like it was a net nerf. However when you look at the value of what she actually gained versus the value of what she lost the rework fixed more of her problems. For example

-Shyv didn't have much of an issue being tanky before. She still doesn't but now her passive snowballs off of mid-bot map control which is easy once she gets ahead.
-Shyv did have issues not getting stopped mid ulti. Especially with things like Poppy and other cc tanks surging in popularity with colossus being as strong as it is, without her ult being changed she would perform much more poorly than she does now. Losing the damage on ult is meaningless here because half the time you got stopped before it applied to anyone.
-Losing missile speed on her e is big, but the speed was exchanged for range, persistent aoe, way more burst on the ability itself, and still retained its capability to mark multiple targets for her autos and q. 

Yes her clear factors, and yes Botrk factors (even though it's the only core item on her that changed), but the meta shouldn't favor her at all, having a larger playrate almost always results in a lower winrate due to people first timing her. You can't just blame this on item synergy and a metashift where she should be hard punished for waiting for her midgame. 

Funny how in a meta full of cc tanks, bruiser carries, and bully junglers abusing a mastery, the one rose to grow out of the concrete is a jungler with no cc or gapcloser pre-6, who farms and hits you with a sack of gold midgame. By that logic my girl Evelynn should feel right at home here. *Looks up win-rate*
